        public User selectUserByUsername​(java.lang.String username)
        Get a user with matching username.

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword​(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password)
        Checks whether the username and the password are matched.
        参数:
        username - related username
        password - related password
        返回:
        true when username and password match.

      • checkUsername

        public boolean checkUsername​(java.lang.String username)
        Checks whether the username is new.
        参数:
        username - related username
        返回:
        the validity of the username.

        参数:

        password - related password
        email - user's email

      • updateUserInfo

        public void updateUserInfo​(User user,

        Update user's info.
        参数:

        changedEmail - whether the email is changed
